name: Robot Journey
description:
Raz is a good robot created by the robotics genius Professor Stanton. But when the professor is kidnapped by the evil robot Zac, Raz embarks on a perilous journey to save him.

Explore an imaginitive and interconnected world where haunted houses and spaceships, yetis and aliens, humans and tastebuds rub shoulders in this bite-sized, NES-inspired metroidvania.

Take your first steps of the journey (and ensure the game runs on your PC) in the Robot Journey free demo! Download it now!

Technical Requirements
Title:Robot JourneyGenre:Action-Adventure Platformer (Metroidvania)Release Date:13 April 2019OS:Windows XP or laterCPU:Intel Pentium 4 2.4 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo or better recommended)RAM:512 MB (2 GB or more recommended)HDD:At least 200 MB freeOther:Video card resolution of 1024x768 or more
Direct X 9.0c or later
